column5: I took my 4 year old Karter out to the hut for a few hours on Monday and we got a couple fish. He is pretty brave and refused gloves to hold this eater.This one was 17.5" and went back in the lake.
Arrrrrgh! It is not letting me post the direct links from photobucket again???????  Thanks BillM I got it now....I think?
Tough little guy you've got there Blair! Great report!
They need to be within URL tags in order to post them.  This site block IMG tags.
Couple great pictures there, always enjoy seeing the kids enjoying themselves !!
